content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: orange_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_trapdoor", "quantity": 61, "index": 15}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 17}, {"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 42, "index": 26}, {"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 10, "index": 29}, {"type": "fletching_table", "quantity": 12, "index": 35}, {"type": "dandelion", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: I need to craft an orange_terracotta, which requires crafting a yellow dye and an orange dye first. To craft a yellow dye, I need to move the dandelion from slot 43 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: orange_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dandelion", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_trapdoor", "quantity": 61, "index": 15}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 17}, {"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 42, "index": 26}, {"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 10, "index": 29}, {"type": "fletching_table", "quantity": 12, "index": 35}]
thought: The yellow dye has been crafted, and can be moved from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

thought: To craft an orange dye, I need to place a red dye to the right of the yellow dye in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move the red dye from slot 19 into slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 2 with quantity 1
